messages.sender: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire
messages.message: Is it a prerequisite to have merge files at the end of each ibflow for joined.xls to be produced?
can you try to running the metaflow binary?

messages.sender: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire
messages.message: BofA and I tried running it a bunch of times. It runs but does not product joined.xls
It might be required to have a merge files in the individual flows. The better way to get a merged output would be to use a postflow udf though
I'm not sure... But it makes sense. joined.xls sounds like something produced from merging files? Oh yeah and did you compile the binary?
I can run some experiments later, but yeah I would go with Justin's suggestion of a postflow udf. We should also be adding these snippets to the code snippet section of the text editor.

messages.sender: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire
messages.message: I think it must be merge files - I'll test some things out.
